title: Cristina Gherasimov
data: Cristina Gherasimov (born 29 January 1984) is a Moldovan politician. She currently serves as Deputy Prime Minister for European Integration of Moldova in the Recean Cabinet.[1][2] As part of her role, she leads the talks for Accession of Moldova to the European Union and hope the negotiation framework set out by the European Commission will enable to speed up the domestic reform agenda for a quicker accession.[3] This article about a Moldovan politician is a stub. You can help Wikipedia by expanding it.
